Posts.EditableText: are there any games that are made in the style of robin johnson's 'detectiveland'? other than detectiveland, of course.
Posts.HTML: are there any games that are made in the style of robin johnson's 'detectiveland'? other than detectiveland, of course.

Posts.EditableText: Of course! There's [Draculaland](http://versificator.net/draculaland/), the first game made with the same engine. And I made a prototype authoring system with a similar interface. The [demo adventure](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/syzwysxlp0qdwn77d7v9dw/secret-of-the-starry-depths) is very modest, though, and I haven't continued development. Not yet, anyway.
